channel.title: Vim on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 11
item.description: Not much happened this week, I started developing a vim plugin to manage my blog, read a little and continued with Chef’s Table; the 1st episode of the 3rd season had me in tears through the whole episode, it was beautiful seeing Jeong Kwan cooking and sharing her story, my favourite chapter yet. [video] Joe Rogan is wondering what I’m hiding!: Rob Braxman responding to a comment made by Joe Rogan in the june second episode of Joe Rogan Experience in which while talking about mass surveillance Joe express that he has been following Rob Braxman and wonders why is he so concerned about online privacy, “what is he hiding?
